text: Robert Campbell Forsyth (5 May 1934 â€“ November 2020) was a Scottish footballer. He played as a goalkeeper for St Mirren, Kilmarnock and Southampton. He also made four international appearances for Scotland in 1964. Forsyth died in November 2020 at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Footballers from Stirling Category:Southampton F.C. players
title: Campbell Forsyth
